question: List 4 monoclonal antibodies in development for the prevention of migraine.
ideal_answer: Four monoclonal antibodies targeting either the CGRP ligand or receptor are being studied for migraine prevention: ALD403 (eptinezumab), AMG 334 (erenumab), LY2951742 (galcanezumab), and TEV-48125 (fremanezumab)

snippets.text: Currently, 4 monoclonal antibodies targeting either the CGRP ligand or receptor are being studied for migraine prevention: ALD403 (eptinezumab), AMG 334 (erenumab), LY2951742 (galcanezumab), and TEV-48125 (fremanezumab).

exact_answer: ALD403, eptinezumab, AMG334, erenumab, LY2951742, galcanezumab, TEV-48125, fremanezumab
